descr.text: of dating pros, seasoned sex and psychology experts, and rockstar support assistants – all here to accompany you on your journey.

teams.name: Sasha
teams.descr: As we work from all corners of the world, creativity flows like confetti at a fabulous party.

teams.name: Tali
teams.descr: Our worldwide outlook lets us ride the trends and connect with our audience like never before.

teams.name: Anna
teams.descr: We're not just a brand – we're a sensational community celebrating love and positivity!

teams.name: Daria
teams.descr: At the heart of it all is YOU, and we're always innovating to bring you exciting new features that guarantee a good time!

teams.name: Mary
teams.descr: It's all about having your back, every step of the way!

teams.name: Nastya
teams.descr: With passion and heart, we create an empowering dating experience for ourselves and for you.

teams.name: Anna
teams.descr: Creating connections worldwide, our team transforms dating into a vibrant celebration of diversity, openness, and freedom.

teams.name: Men
teams.descr: We're shaping the future of inclusive and sex-positive dating, rocking the boat in the best way possible!
